description: It was initially feared that the wounding of an Orthodox cleric in Lyon was a terror attack.
title: Lyon shooting: Suspect admits attacking priest 'over affair'
title_page: Lyon shooting: Suspect admits attacking priest 'over affair' - BBC News
maintext: The newspaper, citing a statement from Lyon's public prosecutor, Nicolas Jacquet, said the suspect "turns out to be the husband of a woman who was having an affair with the victim".
